item.title: Arch and i3 - Hello, Sway! - Install Arch and Sway
item.description:
Welcome to part one of the three-part series “Hello, Sway!” The series is split into

  1. Arch & Sway setup using archinstall
  2. Sway Configuration
  3. Linux QoL Tools

Motivation

For a while already, there has been no real reason for me to keep Windows. The doubt started about two years ago, in January 2023, when I got myself a Steam Deck. Although the purchase was mostly to emulate console and handheld games, of course the question was “But Can It Run Crysis?” To my surprise, the games I tried performed incredibly well, almost all of them out of the box. Thanks to ProtonDB, if there was a title that needed some extra configuration, it is usually there.
